text: The Bitter Truth is a 1917 American silent drama film directed by Kenean Buel and starring Virginia Pearson, Jack Hopkins and William H. Tooker.Solomon p.237 ==Cast== * Virginia Pearson as Anne * Jack Hopkins as Graves * William H. Tooker as Judge Marcus * Alice May as Martha Marcus * Sidney D'Albrook as The Parson ==References== ==Bibliography== * Solomon, Aubrey. The Fox Film Corporation, 1915-1935: A History and Filmography.
